about_the_game:
Meteors are falling from the sky. Hurry up, your objective is to eliminate them by aligning same-colored blocks and launching them upward. Meteorder is an exciting tile-matching puzzle game where you can compete against opponents, explore various planets, and enjoy the beats.

Gameplay

  • Use your cursor to move the blocks vertically (up or down).

  • Match three identical blocks horizontally or vertically to ignite them and launch them upwards.

  • Continue igniting the blocks mid-air until they reach the top of the screen and disappear.

Game Modes

  • Free Mode: Play against various AI opponents or relax and play solo.

  • Challenge Mode: Aim for the highest score within a limited time, or compete against a super AI.

  • Championship: Continuously challenge opponents and win the final championship.

  • Galaxy Voyage: Embark on an interstellar travel adventure, choose different routes, and follow unique game rules.

Explore New Planets

The meteorites you launch will become your resources. Collect them to discover new planets (Themes), each with unique styles and game characteristics, offering completely different experiences and strategies.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon / Intel 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon / Intel 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
